name: Skynet Technology Group
overview:
SkyNet Cyber Systems is a full service strategy and technology consulting firm headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia and includes creative and development teams stretching across the the USA, South Africa, Europe, Hong Kong, India and Shanghai.

SkyNet primarily provides: technology strategy consulting, custom technology development, custom mobility applications (development & strategy), digital media design and implementation (including physical interactive experiences, brand launches and event management), and e/m-commerce solutions to businesses and consumers nationwide.

Our Skilled Team of Operators excel in developing and implementing technology solutions that are truly tailored to our clients individual needs. Our firm services and specialties include:

  • Mobile Application Development and Payment Solutions (mCommerce)
  • Digital Media Design and Deployment (Specific focuses on Computer Vision, Augmented Reality and HCI)
  • Event Management Applications (focused specifically on Athletics, Community Organizations and Educational Facilities)
  • ERP Consultations and Implementations (including PoS, WMS, Supply Chain Solutions, Telephony, etc.)
